record.description: Once the White Eagle Hotel, 18th and Indiana converted to crowded, small apartments. Very badly deteriorated illegal conversions. Tenant shows [the photographer] the condition of the wiring. It was same or worse throughout [the building].
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
